General_Description: '''The Eyes of Kosmos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: No secret went unheard during the [[Peloponnesian War|war]], thanks to the ones known as the [[Eyes of Kosmos]]. To them, knowledge was the greatest tool to control the world, and they endeavored to know all.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every cultist of the Eyes of Kosmos branch. By doing so she obtained the [[Snake Set|Snake]] [[armor|armor set]], [[Dagger of Kronus]], and a clue to the [[Aspasia|identity]] of the [[Ghost of Kosmos]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
